definition.text: I'll get you up to speed with moving around and browsing the charting space in no time... Let's deal with the slider first!

paragraphs.text: Click it and drag it down to close the design space and open the charting space. Do the opposite for the reversed effect. To do it with the keyboard, hit Ctrl + Shift + ↓. Try ↑ ← →  too!
Unless you need both spaces to be partially open, it's always a good idea to fully close either of them to save computing resources in your machine.
